project_abstract.cdata: The Petroleum Sector Rehabilitation Project will: (a) assist the Government in achieving the objective of its petroleum strategy to promote private sector investments in the petroleum sector, strengthen institutional capabilities and establish a suitable regulatory framework to facilitate the development of an efficient and commercially-oriented petroleum sector; (b) assist Regie Autonome for Petroleum, Regie Autonome for Gas and Commercial Enterprise for Crude Oil Transmission in improving its operational efficiency and financial management; and (c) assist in implementing abatement measures to address environmental pollution in the sector.
